title: Could Weaning The U.S. Off Coal Jeopardize The Grid?
teaser: Many people who deal in the energy sector - grid operators, lawmakers and especially the coal industry - are pushing the idea.
contentencoded:
Many people who deal in the energy sector – grid operators, lawmakers and especially the coal industry – are pushing the idea that transitioning away from coal to renewables and natural gas will destabilize our power grid.Â Leigh Paterson from Here & Now contributor Inside Energy reports.
